1.content:
So what type of character are you in this new prison?

Prisoner: Need I say more. You are shrunk and obey both the small male guards and giant female guards and warden of you will suffer massively, and I mean massively.

Female Guards: The cream of the crop here my friends, this is the ladies who are to the shrinks as big as a building to them, and the prison is specially designed with them in mind. They rule the prison with an iron fist, and they can easily make the tinies lives a living hell. Hell even the male guards who are shrunk fear them. It’s so bad that the female guards live at the prison as they get a pampered life in the process as well.

Male guards: Here the male guards are shrunk but they also run the place. They are there to escort the prisoners to their jobs, and are just as brutal in abuse, beating up children even to prove their point. They at times fear what the female giants could do to them but are often spared as they work with them closely.

Children: Wanna know what I am putting this option in here. Because in the Cyromane Prison, children who are taken to this prison often share many of the same problems as adults as it is just as corrupted. Here they are subjected to different conditions, as they are treated lightly better, but to what extend we don’t know. Many were brought in because of corruption in the system, or some were born in prison by the shrunken females so they are now property of Cyroname. I can keep going on and on, but we be here all day.

Giant Young Girls: Don’t know why this prison does it, but apparently the Cyroname offered the female guards the right to let their kids live and run the prison with them, and are just as tall. They are girls as young as 5 towering prisoners, and they are truly a hand full to deal with. They even have special areas were they play with prisoners or use them, and many, many deaths happen here because of it. But the system is corrupted so who cares.

So who will it be?
1.title: What type of person are you

Alright, here is the format to use, get to it.

11.title: Adult Prisoners (18+)

111.content:
Name: Casey Park

Age: 23

Sex: Male

Height: 4.5 inches (was 6'1")

Appearance: Blonde hair, blue eyes, pale skin, slightly baggy orange jumpsuit as he was given one size too big

Occupation: Journalist

Personality: Casey is a brave and caring man, he tries to stand up for those oppressed even at risk to himself

Backstory: Being a journalist Casey never shied away from a story, even with knowing the risks. With more and more prisons switching to -in his opinion- barbaric form of punishment, he decided to make a stand. Organizing protests in his spare time and writing stories on the prisons to bring up public awareness. Most of the stories that were published were just announcing people sentenced to them and how the prisons run, as the higher ups did not wish to go against the government and risk their names and livelihoods. Casey typically escaped the police when his protests went south, doing his best to scatter his group before they were marched on. Sadly during his 5th protest a co-worker of his informed the authorities ahead of time leading to his arrest. He was quickly sentenced and sent away to Cyromane Maximum Security Complex. Now he gets a journalists dream, first hand knowledge. Just so happens it will be from himself.

Additional info: Casey has a pretty good memory. He tries to either document his experiences or tries to find ways to memorize it so he can report it properly if he ever escapes

How long has Casey been at Cyromane?
111.title: Casey Park

choices: Casey wakes up way later, time to learn the prison
1111.content:
Right now Casey Park has just been on the bus the last several others being transferred to the Cyromane Maximum Security Complex. He was basically guilty for trying to slander the company’s name and for conspiracy. He was sentenced to several years in the prison, but rumor has it that not many people get out of the prison at all, and they were even huge reports that the prisoners often end up dead in the process, mainly through abuse.

Just as the bus got to the facility in the middle of the deserts. The male guards that are currently inside the busy got up and ordered all the prisoners to get in and line and head off the bus. “Alright you prisoners, time to get off, your new life awaits here.” He said with a smirk, but evil smile.

Casey Park did what he was told and got off the bus with the other prisoners, while trying to keep his prison uniform from being so saggy. Maybe they gave him a size too tall for him. They all out a bit in the desert to get to the facility, going through all the gates and IDing stuff that you would expect. During all of this, one of the guards came up to Casey Park and reacted.

“So, you are a journalist who wanted to get inside knowledge of the facility from what we heard on your file. Well your wish is surely going to be granted, provided you ever get out alive of this place.” The guard mocked just as he noticed the writing materials that he have in his hands. The male guards then knock it out of his hands. Casey then resoundingly picks it up.

“Oh I intend to.”

After they go through the entire process, they were formed into a line in front of a room call the “Shrinking Room”. They were multiple lines as they were more rooms that have the shrinking rooms, where they will shrink their victims. The line ends up going very fast as the people were going in at a fast rate, like almost every minute. Eventually it got to Casey, who then went in to the room.

When he read inside, he was knocked out by a guard and was knocked out cold. What is inside is many other bodies, that are also knocked out but not dead, as they didn’t want them finding out about the procedure of how they shrink their victims. Soon enough people were in the room, and the room was like a futuristic virtual simulator, that then suddenly starts to glow a blight light. The light engulfs the entire room, and suddenly all the prisoners that were in their shrunk. Clothes and personal property in their intact at the shrink person’s size. The room glows a blight light and the energy from the light will shrink the victim. (Not the best explaining but it will do).

Soon, the big door opens up, and we see a female warden come in, wearing a smoking hot outfit, and she scooped up all the tiny prisoners in a box and places takes them to another part of the facility. She and a few others walk down the halls and then reaches an elevator that takes them down further into the facility. The facility is underground, and it is very deep underground, like thousands of feet underground. Cyromane spared no expense when making the prison.

Soon after reaching the bottom, they see many small tiny black armored guards that are the size of the prisoners shrunk. The female wardens and guards tower over the armored soldiers and they brought the box down and release the prisoners from it. “Take these prisoners to their cells and get them woke up for orientation day.”

“Yes lady.” The armored soldier replied back, and he and his fellow soldiers started grabbing the soldiers one by one and start taking them to their cells. During this whole time, Casey is still knocked out and he and the fellow prisoners were now being taken to their cells.

Their cells are the most basic that you can think of. A toilet, a shower, a bed, and all in concrete and steel. There were no electric outlets at all, but there was a desk. On top of the small cell is a camera that is indestructible and cannot be hacked or turned off, and it watches the prisoners every move. Casey was placed onto the bed with the mattress and pillow by the guard and then the guard smiled. “Sleep tight for now, as you will be woke up soon.”

What happens now?
1111.title: Fresh new meat

15.title: Giant young girls (5-17)

151.content:
Name: Sarah Oleander

Age: 10

Sex: Female

Height: 4"10

Appearance: Brightly colored pink or purple tshirts with black or white skirts or the occasional black or blue shorts and white ankle socks with either black bary jane shoes or pink and white velcro sneakers. She is short and a bit pudgy with blonde hair usually kept in a ponytail with a pin of a cartoon dog on her scrunchy.

Occupation: In her mind, a babysitter or pet owner. And part time monster if she is feeling roudy

Personality: Sarah seems quite nice and she does try to be. However being raised in the prison by the guards as her only teachers, her actions towards the tiny prisoners are actually extreamly cruel despite her having no ill will. She does not see them as peoole but rather things, toys, or pets and whule she trys to keep her things well maintained she is really torturing and humiliating them. Not to say sometimes she doesn't get a little mischevious and really does torment them for the sake of tormenting them.

Backstory: Sarah was born within the confines of the prison to one of the many female guards. This has never bothered her though as its really all she has ever known. Other guards constantly praise her for what good work she does with the prisoners only reinforcing her unintentionally cruel behaviour. These days Sarah want's to be more grown up and has taken to treating prisoner as pets like dogs or treating them as children or baby dolls all to make herself feel more mature. Of course she also can't resist being worshiped by having her feet licked or being a bit devious by sitting in the tinies to have them squirm. One thing she tries to avoid is killing them as that shows she is taking bad care of her tiny toys.
151.title: Slot 1: Sarah Oleander

1511.content:
"Wait wait, I promise I'll be good. I'll put it on just give me one more chance. I want to be good, just one more chance!" The man begged as he struggled and thrashed hanging upside down and trying to ignore the scent wafting up from below him and failing miserably. The young girl looked at him with a small pout as she held one of his legs between her fingers, dangling him above a bin of soiled diapers, her foot on the pedal holding the lid open. He glanced at the table behind him seeing a dog mascot suit with big floppy ears for his head. Her newest toy here has refused to dress up for her so she needed to punish him. It's only natural to punish your pets when they act up or else they would never learn and she knew tinies hated being in the diaper bin from the younger girls.


"You've been bad and need to learn a lesson. I promise I'll let you out later and you can have a chance to prove you're a good boy. Three days should be enough time to learn." Sarah says with a huff before dropping the screaming tiny man down into the smelly depths of the soiled bin of diapers before letting the lid slam shut silencing any tiny screams coming from its depths. She goes to leave before looking back, remembering how annoyed she was at his disobedience she walked back over before viciously shaking the bin to shake up the revolting contents and properly bury her disrespectful pet deep into the bin so he could try and burrow his way back to the top. With that she returned over to her small table and slid open one of the drawers of a cabinet labeled "Stuffers" revealing a few tiny prisoners who shook upon seeing her. With a warm smile she plucked two of them out who began sobbing upon being freed from the drawer. She smiled at them warmly as she sat down and popped off both her black mary janes,wiggling her socked toes.


"Now I'm going to go get a new friend to play with today, but trying to train that last one got me all angry and sweaty so I need you to help clean up my socks and shoes okay? Do a good job and I'll feed you after." She says cheerfully as she lowers both the prisoners into her shoes and begins slipping her small sweaty feet into the moist confines. She thought she heard them begin yelling but figured they were just excited. Her stuffers NEVER acted up. With a little scrunch of her toes to apply reassurance she began skipping out of her colorful pink room to the cells to get a new tiny. After all she was do for a new...
1511.title: Follow Sarah

info.brief_description: You are going to prison, but their is a catch, you are shrunk! Will you survive? Read/add!
info.description:
We all know how prisons are meant to rehabilitate and punishment people based on their crimes. Well recently in the U.S., crime rates were off the complete charts, to almost horrifying levels, and the prisons were getting extremely overcrowded and that has led to riots and uprisings. Then one day a private prison corporation called Cyromane came up with a solution to their problem. Their prison uses state of the art size changing technology to shrink the prison inmate to a height that can be really easy to manage to roughly 3-5 inches depending on the age of the victim. They believed that with their method, they can easily save tons of space in prison and make the inmates much more easier to control. The U.S. absolutely agreed with this new type of system and as a result, started installing and changing prisons around the country to support this new system.

The system then soon catches on with the rest of the world, and then new laws were made to where any prisoner who ends up committing a crime serious enough will be made to serve their sentence shrunk, and only by completing it can they be able to gain back their normal size. Only problems is, because of the new prison system, that may be much easier said than done, as the prison guards, who are actually all women given that they prefer that women run the place, are absolutely cruel and loves being giant to the tinies, and will do everything to make their lives hell. Rumor even has it that children are sent to the prison to and they aren’t much better in conditions, and they are even young girls who actually help run the prison with a promise of a pamper life system being able to rule the tinies who can kill them with the slightest infraction as again, new laws made them small so they are not really human anymore. Many prisoners who enter the new system don’t come out, and those who do are scarred for life, and I mean for life. Its even so corrupt that even innocent people and bystanders, and protesters of inhumane conditions were even put there to be silenced.

Our story is set in the Cyromane Maximum Security Complex, where the prisoners of course are shrunk. It runs mostly like a normal prison, with the male guards being shrunk to watch them on the ground, and the the female guards being giant to really enforce order. Only thing is that the male guards actually don’t get the punishment of the female giantesses given they are on the job, but they are just as corrupt. They are plenty of things to do in this prison like slave labor for no pay 7 days a week being the play toy of a young girl who lives in the prison as a giantess, or rubbing the older females back, stuff like that. There is a chow line, and plenty of other stuff that prisons usually have to make it rehabilitative, provided that they aren’t killed and doing slave labor of course. And the icing on the cake, men, women, and children are housed together.

Okay, enough of that, time to get to the rules of the story.

I only have one major rule for this story, no male giants, that is it.

Here is the character format you will use:

Name:
Age:
Sex:
Height:
Appearance: (prisoners are provided with prison clothes as usual, an orange jumpsuit, and etc)
Occupation:
Personality:
Backstory:
Additional info:

Going to base some of the wards off this story here, so credit goes to Starlock who made Fetish Prison: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/1926117-Fetish-Prison

Remember to add to these stories as well.

Girlzilla: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2226717-Girlzilla-Giantes...

Life of a Giant Kid/Kidzilla: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2226082-Life-of-a-Giant-K...
